title: Earliest you can clear backlog
content: I'm currently in 5th sem and ESAs are going on. I didn't do well for one of the subjects so i know I'm getting a backlog. When's the soonest time period where i can clear this backlog. Does pes have something like Fastrack like rv where i can clear within the first few months of the next sem?

comments.body: Nah, the earliest you can still clear it is at the end of 6th sem.
